message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $10000. I can do $13000, which is a bit of a compromise for me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11500?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11500 and my previous offer of $13000. How about $12500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?
